Service Details: - Designs, builds, and expands affordable housing in the Okanagan- Operates independent rental housing for seniors, families, women, and women with children- Provides support to women and children in transition and connects them with donated resources and community services- Promotes and encourages tenant community activities, connection and collaboration
How to Apply: - Applications are available at the office or may be downloaded from the website- Applications must be mailed in or dropped off at the office- Faxed applications will not be accepted
Address & Map: 2055 Benvoulin Crt, #101Kelowna, BC     V1W 2C7View MapQuest Map
